transcript: Well then you're just gonna look stupid because I'm just waiting for an ID and you're gonna make security Take me out because I want my ID

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, then you're just gonna look stupid because I'm just waiting for an I.D. and you're gonna make security take me out because I want my I.D.
